name: Azimuth Zero
description:
Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 47. The theme was "stuck in a loop."

Welcome to the planet! Now it's time to get to work - you've got a lot of deliveries to make before the end of your shift. We don't have satellite navigation technology here, but your delivery vehicle is outfitted with all the tools you need for celestial navigation.

Oh, you've been here before? They say the planet and stars change all the time...
